delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This action is irreversible.
credits_beta_text: Special thanks to our beta testers, whose feedback was invaluable in shaping this game. Their contributions have been greatly appreciated:
credits_affiliation_text: Pokegg and all elements of this website are not affiliated with The Pokémon Company International. Pokémon is a registered trademark of The Pokémon Company International. All references to Pokémon in this project are made for educational and recreational purposes only.
changelog_v0500_1_desc: Choose which sprite to display for Pokémon throughout the entire application.
changelog_v0500_1b: 5G Static: Pokémon Black & White sprites. Pixelated like on DS.
changelog_v0500_1c: 5G Anim: ANIMATED sprites like on Pokémon Black & White 2.
changelog_v0404_1a: Options page translations now load correctly on page load
changelog_v0404_1b: Idle mode no longer allows multiple eggs to hatch simultaneously
changelog_v0403_1_desc: For your little eyes. Activable in options.
changelog_v0403_2_desc: A mode allowing you to chain eggs automatically with the incubator autoclicker. Activable in options.
changelog_v0403_3a: A click outside a popup closes it.
changelog_v0403_3b: Purchases and item usage in inventory greatly streamlined
idle_description: Automatically hatch the next egg after 1 second if no new Pokémon popup appears
changelog_v0600_1_desc: Redeem promotional codes to unlock rewards. Cheat codes and promotional distributions.
changelog_v0600_2_desc: Fixed sprites for Nidoran family, Mime Jr., and Skarmory families.
